episode.title: 12 Hours a Day
episode.rawTitle: 111: ‘12 Hours a Day’ With Guest John Moltz
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest John Moltz returns to the show. Topics include Apple Watch; rumors that Apple is working on a secret car project; our love of old Mac hardware; and a long discussion on Ian Parker’s extraordinary New Yorker profile of Jony Ive and his design team at Apple.
